Package org.project3.rest_api.services

Class MenuServiceController

java.lang.Object
org.project3.rest_api.services.MenuServiceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/menu") @CrossOrigin public class MenuServiceController extends Object
Exposes menu-related services through endpoints
Author:
Soham Nagawanshi

  • Method Details

    • getMenuItems

      @GetMapping public List<MenuItem> getMenuItems()
      Queries all menu items from database
      Returns:
      list of MenuItem

    • addMenuItem

      @PostMapping public MenuItem addMenuItem(@RequestBody MenuItem newMenuItem)
      Creates new menu item in database
      Parameters:
      newMenuItem - MenuItem object to be created in database
      Returns:
      the created MenuItem object

    • updateMenuItem

      @PutMapping public void updateMenuItem(@RequestBody MenuItem updatedMenuItem)
      Updates menu items in database
      Parameters:
      updatedMenuItem - MenuItem object to be updated in database

    • getSalesReport

      @GetMapping("/sales-report") public Map<String,Integer> getSalesReport(@RequestParam Integer startMonth, @RequestParam Integer endMonth, @RequestParam Integer startDay, @RequestParam Integer endDay)
      Retrieves sales report for a given date range
      Parameters:
      startMonth - the starting month of the date range
      endMonth - the ending month of the date range
      startDay - the starting day of the date range
      endDay - the ending day of the date range
      Returns:
      a map containing sales data

    • getDiscount

      @GetMapping("/discount") public Boolean getDiscount()
      Checks if all menu items are discounted
      Returns:
      true if all menu items are discounted, false otherwise

    • updateDiscount

      @PutMapping("/update-discount") public void updateDiscount(@RequestParam Boolean isDiscounted)
      Updates menu item discount
      Parameters:
      isDiscounted - the discount status to be updated
